name: Capture your employee's special requests on Airtable and send Slack notifications
description: Use this template to instantly receive special requests from employees through Typeform. Avoid those requests via email which can be a mess. For example, a request for gym access. The employee completes a Typeform form, the request is added to Airtable and a Slack notification is sent through Slack to a person or channel. It works with this [Airtable Base.](https://airtable.com/shrq94sArZkbeoMXq/tblmnpeH14Lx6cotS/viwm9uS6YN3Qd7ryh?blocks=hide)
